Uses of Package
imagingbook.spectral.dft

  • Packages that use imagingbook.spectral.dft 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.spectral.dft  
  • Classes in imagingbook.spectral.dft used by imagingbook.spectral.dft 
    Class Description
    Dft1d
    Interface specifying all one-dimensional DFT/FFT implementations.
    Dft1d.Double  
    Dft1d.Float  
    Dft1dDirect
    Direct (slow) implementation of the 1-dimensional DFT using tabulated sine and cosine values.
    Dft1dFast
    FFT (fast) implementation of the DFT, based on the JTransforms package by Piotr Wendykier (see https://github.com/wendykierp/JTransforms).
    Dft2d
    Two-dimensional DFT implementation.
    ScalingMode
    Scaling mode used for the DFT.
